title: I need help
body: How can i fix this. like every time im on a team fight or fighting enemy team i always lag. is there something i can do about this?

replies.body: It sounds like you've got an unstable connection, so something like packet loss might be failing to properly communicate what's happening in these high demand moments.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to help us gt an overview and know for sure.  Let me know what you find!
